title: [RG.REBOOT] (ONLINE) Payday 2 Updates 1-3 with CRACK (08-19-2013
description:
1. Install the updates in order (if you have installed updates previously, then use the newest update available)

2. Open the 'Payday 2 MP-FIX V2.rar' file and extract them into your Payday 2 directory.

3. Open Steam (with Greenluma recommended) and launch the payday2_win32_release.exe. (DO NOT USE STEAM'S ADD NON STEAM GAME)

4. Have fun playing online yet again! (Be sure your appid is set to 480)

If you need any help, please leave a comment.
